website_summaries.verdict: Our top pick is backed by a lifetime warranty. It's just as solid as other more expensive models and comes in a variety of colors.
pros: Its rustproof construction makes it great for outdoor use
Suitable for hot or cold drinks
Keeps drinks well insulated for hours on end
cons: Its sturdy construction makes it a little heavier than other models

customer_reviews.title: Beware, there is a drinking hole in lid and no tab to close it
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed that there is a drinking hole in the lid and no tab to close it. The product pictures do not show the lid and the description is unclear, so I want to make other potential buyers aware. For me, a tight fitting lid is critical...I don't want to worry that my mug will tip over and spill not beverage all over my car seat. Very disappointed in the lid!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jefferies

customer_reviews.title: A great coffee cup.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee mug so much, I bought 2 more, 1 to gift, and 1 to keep in my truck. This mug is exactly the same as other, more expensive brands. And I mean *exactly* the same. It appears they are made in the same factory, with the same molds. It will keep a drink with ice in it cold all day long, and I mean that literally. I use it mostly for coffee, though, and it keeps coffee hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hovey

customer_reviews.title: Nasty black seal junk
customer_reviews.text: The black seal continues to oxidize and leave black junk on the lid. If it falls the lid pops off and all my Rum and Coke Zero falls out. Now I use a rubber band as a band-aid...
customer_reviews.author: Hollywoody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Stays hot and cold for hours. The ice stays for almost a day which was a life saver when i had the flu. Love these mugs I have 2 and not sure I could live without them now! Only thing I'd like is for the lid to completely seal so I don't have any spill concerns.
customer_reviews.author: EllieA

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep liquid warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it said it would keep hot drinks hot for several hours. It didn't even work for one hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jaiye

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love Ozark Trail products
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Ozark Trail products! However, this particular tumbler does not have the same quality as other Ozark Trail tumblers I have purchased. It does not keep my drink cold for hours. The ice melts within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Travis

customer_reviews.title: Enthusiastic recommendation.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Works wonderfully. With top on, mine will keep ice frozen for over 24 hours at room temperature. Do not spend the extra money on fashion insulated mugs like a Yeti. This works the same for much less. Full function for less money is as sexy as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rafe W. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Great container!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is durable, you can tell it’s made well and keeps my drinks at the right temperature for hours
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality.
customer_reviews.text: Outer face of navy tumbler is heavily scratched. Labels are faded and discoloured. Product looks old and used. Very disappointing quality. I wish to refund / replace the tumbler, but that would require me to spend extra money for the postage fee. I am provided with an inferior product, and yet am required to pay extra money to rectify the problem. This is unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. I love these cups. They do keep your drink cold. I want to draw attention that the label was hard to get off. I had to soak it...or I would have given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Donna F. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: OZARK TRAIL insleated cup.
customer_reviews.text: It will keep ice for over 24 hours in 75 deg. weather. Just as good as Yeti at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: T.THUNDER

customer_reviews.title: I feel like if your not drinking out of this cup
customer_reviews.text: I feel like if your not drinking out of this cup, you are not experiencing the way drinks are supposed to taste! I don't know how this cup does it but it actually makes the drink colder and it lasts forever! I highly recommend this to those who work long days and it takes hours to drink a coffee or an iced tea, this cup will help preserve the temperature. Really cant say enough good things about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Stahley

customer_reviews.title: No spill proof lid?!?
customer_reviews.text: Why does this not come with a lid that seals to avoid spills? I’ve seen similar tumblers for the same place that have a lid that can be closed. Very disappointed that I didn’t notice that before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the yeti
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I have the more expensive yeti cup and this is every comparable at a much better price. I’ll be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good cup and it does hold ice for the day (in an office setting). However, it does not hold it overnight or in the heat very well.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Winfrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. Holds cold and hot drinks for hours, looks great, fits in car cup holder. Will be buying more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: SEAL2

customer_reviews.title: Same as a Yeti but cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than a Yeti for the same exact build quality and function. The color is an added bonus. Love these things!
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: For the cost you can't beat it. Have had the extreamly expensive brand and for the 1 hour longer it keeps ice it makes no sence to spend the money on the more expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: Sy

customer_reviews.title: Best cup ever
customer_reviews.text: Best cup ever. I’m someone that can only drink ice cold water and this bad boy keeps my ice frozen for 12+ hours. It’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Ice will remain in the cup for up to 24 hours. Compared to the way more expense brand, cost is less than half and works just as well. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! My ice cubes stand ice cubes for over 20 hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: BIRDIE

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the one pictured. It had a different finish and it was a metal finish not powered as shown in the picture. I used it one night and the finish already started coming off the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: KAV

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I received this today. It was wrapped in bubble wrap but it looked used and had scratches on it. I’m very disappointed because it’s a Christmas gift and I was supposed to take it tomorrow to get decals on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: i use this cup every day and it keeps my water cold all day. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Beckley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup. Keeps my water cold for a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: use it every day and works great for coffee and also cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: had this for a while now. use it every day and works great for coffee and also cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the powder coat finish
customer_reviews.text: I love the powder coat finish, unfortunately the people that shipped it just threw it in a box and I'm sure it got rattled around in transit and came with a scuff on it that I can't get off. the scuff isn't big but it's still there.
customer_reviews.author: Zackery Milson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and can you use it for my water. The downfall is the lack of closure on top.
customer_reviews.author: KEISHA S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cup
customer_reviews.text: Held ice all day into the next day this is a great cup will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Dave Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all. Given that the lid has ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. Given that the lid has a hole in it ( to sip) so it cools off fast.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as good or better than the Yeti at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy Work
customer_reviews.text: Look if you're going to take people's hard earned money, at least give them a good product. Cup has scratches, dent on the bottom and looks like paint that isn't supposed to be on there. Also the powder coating is sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pease

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cold, and cool colors
customer_reviews.text: I took this tumbler to Mexico for vacation and it kept my drinks cold for hours at the pool in hot and humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: Libby J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ozark Trail cup. The cup keeps your drinks cold or hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is perfect and keeps drinks cold for a long time! I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Todd Brown

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE CONDITION!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased 2 & they are both in terrible condition. One doesn't even have the lid. There are terrible scratches on both! These are supposed to be Christmas gifts! Returning them ASAP! It gone 1 star because I HAD to!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Paulk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the sticker will take some elbow grease to get off.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Quijada

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the Orange Ozark Trails and what I received ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Orange Ozark Trails and what I received was a silver one. This was part of my husbands valentines gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah French

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not close!
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn't close! Therefore, I would not consider this product to be spill proof as described. Very disappointed because description doesn't indicate this detail not does it provide adequate pictures of the product to identify the functionality of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Second time receiving dented and scratched items
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've tried to get a cup and both times they have been scratched and dented. VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this tumbler because I love the orange and I've heard these are just as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tumbler because I love the orange and I've heard these are just as good as Yeti for half the price. Whelp, they definitely are! In fact, I also have a yeti tumbler and I did a test and this Ozark performed just as well as the Yeti so if you're on the fence have no fear and go for the Ozark! Plus, more color options so what's not to love!? The powder-coated feels much better too
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Ice Lasted 24 Hours At Home
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how long ice lasts in this cup (we've had ice last as long as 24 hours). Beware that cup is easy to dent. Ordinarily this wouldn't be a problem, but dropped our in sink and it dented the bottom. Cup now a little wobbly so we have to be careful where we set it.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Workman

customer_reviews.title: I understand people love this cup (it does an amazing job keeping drinks ...
customer_reviews.text: I understand people love this cup (it does an amazing job keeping drinks cold!), but am I the only one that has an issue with the lid?! I feel like there's a gap between the lid and/or that the hole you drink from is made in a way that makes it feel as though water is always on the verge of spilling out the sides of my mouth! I have to use a straw or drink without the lid all together to avoid that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H

customer_reviews.title: Great mug
customer_reviews.text: These are such great mugs! My only complaint is that on this orange colored on the coating is a bit thin in one spot so the color is not a bright in one area. But it's fine. My husband positions the handle I got for him to use with it over the faded spot so it really doesn't show.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: walmart need to carry more colors of this great mugs
customer_reviews.text: came from walmart wish they carry other colors in stores, would save me some money on shipping. this are really nice mugs just have to order a different lid so straw will work and handle to be all set, do hold cold ice for hours and keep hot for hours 10-12
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it’s been used. It is covered in scratched and color is already scratched off in places. Disappointing 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Caseymoe

customer_reviews.title: Yeti watch out
customer_reviews.text: Great Tumbler, ice stays in there for well over 24 hours. Easy to clean, good looking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TLTommy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this. Survived a few drops and a long trip. Still keeps my drinks cold or hot for good long time.
customer_reviews.author: D Adams

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The description says 30 oz. But I received the .20 oz tumbler. Only reason I'm giving 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Like a Yeti but for a 3rd of the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Keeps my coffee warm for awhile in the mornings considering the outside temperature is around 30 or lower on my drive to work. It's easy to clean and very durable. Just like a Yeti but for a third of the price, can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This cup has been working well for me. It keeps my cold drink cold for several hours. I wanted stainless steel to brew my tea and then add ice. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product I ever bought on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup get the handle Use everyday keeps coffee hot Ice will last all night
customer_reviews.author: marc mora

customer_reviews.title: Love Ozark Trail
customer_reviews.text: Love Ozark Trail! They keep things cold and keep things warm a lot longer than you'd expect for the price, and I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Royce Michna

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting this to hold ice better as my other brand does
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to hold ice better as my other brand does. It does a fine job of keeping drinks hot.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I also bought the 20oz. I also bought handles and closed lids..keeps my ice water cold or my coffee hot!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many of these types of tumblers and love these Ozarks!
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding cup. I use it everyday. It keeps my water cold all day
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It keeps my drink nice and cool for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: just like it says, keeps liquids cold all day
customer_reviews.text: just as advertised keeps things cold all day and it fits in the cup holders in the car
customer_reviews.author: NJIDOC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Very surprised at the quality of this for the price. Drinks stay cold for hours!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tumbler, just a good if not better than higher priced items!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tumbler! Maintains temperature better than most tumblers on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the drinks hot or cold for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tampagurl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes the cup it keeps drinks cold for hours I give it a five

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the color. Got it as a Christmas gift for my husband from our greatniece
customer_reviews.author: K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cup and does what it advertise to do. I will be purchasing more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as a Yeti and cheaper. Love the color.

customer_reviews.title: Still works great tho
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the orange one, but the silver one came instead. Still works great tho

customer_reviews.title: I love this container
customer_reviews.text: I love this container. The ice lasts all day without melting when filled up to the top. I also bought the cup holder and it's a perfect match. Very convenient. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received a 20oz tumbler and not a 30oz tumbler as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and keeps water cold for days. Works perfect for hot Florida weather and going to the pool or beach.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups! Keeps drinks cold and ice from melting all day!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 100% just as good as Yeti for 1/4 of the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! Keeps beverage hot or cold for hours upon hours

product_meta.title: Ozark Trail Orange 30oz. Vacuum Insulated Powder Coated Stainless Steel Tumbler
product_meta.description: Whether your're on a camping adventure or jumping into your car for your morning commute, you can keep your thirst under control with this handsome and durable Ozark Trail tumbler. This 30-ounce travel tumbler is made with high-grade 18/8 stainless steel, and is double-walled and vacuum-sealed for maximum temperature control, so it's equally suited to sustaining the temperature of both hot and cold beverages. Whether you like to keep your sweet tea chilled on a hot summer day, or would rather keep your hot coffee from going lukewarm 10 minutes into your commute, this travel cup has you covered.
feature_bullets: Great for both hot and cold liquids
Ideal for a range of activities
Durable, made of high-grade, double-walled stainless steel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
